start.header: Ask a question about getting access to your eVisa

biometric-residence-permit-number.header: Do you know your biometric residence permit number?
biometric-residence-permit-number.paragraph: You can find this in the top right corner on the front panel of the permit.

reference-numbers.header: Do you have any of the following reference numbers?
reference-numbers.paragraph: This will help us link your enquiry to your account.

your-details.intro: Enter your contact details below. We will use these to respond to your question.

upload.intro: Upload screenshots or images of the problem, if you have them.
upload.accepted-types: Accepted files types are JPG, PNG or GIF
upload.upload-maximum: You may submit a maximum of {{maxUploads}} files

confirmation.title: Question sent
confirmation.feedback-link-text: What do you think of this service?
